page.title: 13WEST STREET 'ENTERTAINMENT'
page.content: West Street is one of the most visited streets in Brighton because it houses the main night-clubs, cinemas, and amusement arcades. At present there are six amusement arcades housing over 2,000 video and fruit machines on one side of the street! There are two main discotheques- The 'Pink Coconut' used to be known as 'Sherry's Ballroom' during the 1920's (Opened 1924) and lasted through tothe late l9707s altering its image with the changing tastes of music and the 'Top Rank' which was formerly a swimming poolin the 1930's called S.S.Brighton and later became a roller and ice skating rink.
